author: Johnny Harris
description:
100 Million vs 100 Billion

The number of enormous fortunes has exploded in recent decades — and with them, the influence of the 0.0001%. We dive into how those worth anywhere between $100 million to $100 billion spend and protect their wealth, from luxury real estate and superyachts to political and cultural power plays that shape life for the rest of us.
